Evolution History

Recent language improvements and changes
v0.3.0
high impact
2024-01-15
Pattern Matching System
Added comprehensive pattern matching with match/case syntax

Example Usage

match value do case Some(x): say x case None: say "empty" end
v0.2.5
high impact
2024-01-10
Result Type Enhancement
Improved error handling with Result<T, E> type

Example Usage

func divide(a: Int, b: Int) -> Result<Int, String>
v0.2.0
medium impact
2024-01-05
Async/Await Support
Added async functions and await keyword for concurrent operations

Example Usage

async func fetch_data() -> Data { let response be await http.get(url) return response }
v0.1.8
high impact
2023-12-20
Trait System
Implemented trait-based polymorphism for better code reuse

Example Usage

trait Display { func show(self) -> String }
v0.1.5
critical impact
2023-12-15
Memory Safety Improvements
Enhanced ownership and borrowing system

Example Usage

func process(data: &String) -> Int
